Darkvision. The bugbear has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

Languages. The bugbear can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

Bugbear's Inspiration. Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the bugbear who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

Punishing Shake.name: Punishing Shake
Punishing Shake.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed and makes a signature Bite attack against one target. If the attack hits and the target is Medium or smaller, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] also shakes and flings them up to 10 feet away horizontally. If the target hits a solid surface, they are knocked &Reference[prone] and take an extra [[/damage @prof bludgeoning]] damage.

Hypnotic Sleep.name: Hypnotic Sleep
Hypnotic Sleep.description: As a bonus action, the hunter drones lullingly. Each creature within 5 feet of the hunter who can hear them must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or fall &reference[unconscious] for 1 minute. An unconscious target wakes up if they take damage, the hunter becomes incapacitated, the hunter moves more than 5 feet away from the target, or another creature uses an action to rouse the target.

affects.special: Must be able to hear the retainer.

Undying Hunger.name: Undying Hunger
Undying Hunger.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can perceive each creature within 30 feet of them who isn't a &Reference[Construct]{Construct} or an &Reference[Undead], as if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had &Reference[blindsight].

Brutal Charge.name: Brutal Charge
Brutal Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.description:
A hobgoblin has the following defining features:

Size. The hobgoblin's size is Medium.

Type. The hobgoblin's type is Humanoid.

Speed. The hobgoblin has a walking speed of 30 feet.

Damage Resistances. The hobgoblin has resistance to fire damage.

Darkvision. The hobgoblin has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

Languages. The hobgoblin can speak, read, and write Common, Goblin, and Infernal.

Infernal Ichor. When the hobgoblin dies, their corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the hobgoblin takes fire damage equal to the hobgoblin's proficiency bonus.

Astral Presence.name: Astral Presence
Astral Presence.description: As an action, the sycophant becomes &reference[invisible] for 1 minute or until they use a bonus action to end this effect. While invisible, the sycophant can move through creatures and objects as if they were &reference[difficult terrain], and the sycophant's signature attacks deal an extra [[lookup @prof.flat]] damage to creatures who can't see them. The sycophant takes 5 (1d10) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Extra Damage.name: Extra Damage
Extra Damage.condition: When the retainer hits a creature with a signature attack.

Self Damage.name: Self Damage
Self Damage.condition: When the retainer ends their turn inside an object.

Astral Presence.name: Astral Presence
Astral Presence.description:
The retainer is invisible for the duration or until they use a bonus action to end this effect.

While invisible, the sycophant can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain and it's signature attacks deal extra damage. The sycophant takes force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Shield? Shield!.name: Shield? Shield!
Shield? Shield!.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't incapacitated or prone. To benefit from this trait, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must be wielding a shield.

Transmute Ground.name: Transmute Ground
Transmute Ground.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] picks a 10-foot-square area of ground they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YufZSxk1lBF7Sicw]] Strength saving throw or partially sink into the ground and become &Reference[restrained]. A creature can use their action to make a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=FAfgy7zoNTyyLvz1]] Strength (Athletics) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success and ending the restrained condition for the freed creature.

Sickening Sympathy.name: Sickening Sympathy
Sickening Sympathy.description:
2nd-Order Telepathy Power

The creature who made the triggering attack must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be &reference[poisoned] until the end of their next turn as they feel the nauseous pain of their target.

save.condition: When another creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit with an attack.

Liquefy.name: Liquefy
Liquefy.description:
3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power

You psionically barrage your attacker with transformative energy. The attacker must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from you and &reference[restrained] until the end of their next turn, as their lower body temporarily melts into an immovable goo.

save.condition: When you are hit with an attack by a creature within 5 feet of you.

Crystallize.name: Crystallize
Crystallize.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows sharp crystals from the ground in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, that area becomes difficult terrain for their enemies, and when an enemy moves into or within that area, the enemy takes 2×[[lookup @prof.flat]] piercing damage for every 5 feet they travel.

Vicinity Shift.name: Vicinity Shift
Vicinity Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and each ally within 30 feet of them gains a +[[lookup @prof]] bonus to damage rolls and has their speed doubled until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Additionally, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one signature attack as part of this action.

Hypnotic Mane.name: Hypnotic Mane
Hypnotic Mane.description: Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HFBgEEKvKTbJ9Jyx]] Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While charmed in this way, a creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0. If a creature charmed in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends on that creature.

Piscine Transformation.name: Piscine Transformation
Piscine Transformation.description:
3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power

You target a Humanoid you can see within range with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of your choice for the duration. The target can choose to fail this saving throw.

Head. The target's head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can't speak.

Legs. The target's legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Torso. The target's torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn't underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

Increased Order. When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2 to target any creature, instead of just a Humanoid, if they have the necessary body part you wish to transform.

Additionally, you can increase this power's order by 2 to increase its duration to 1 hour.

Piscine Transformation (Head).name: Piscine Transformation (Head)
Piscine Transformation (Head).description: Your head is transformed into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for your body. You cannot speak.

Piscine Transformation (Legs).name: Piscine Transformation (Legs)
Piscine Transformation (Legs).description: Your legs become fins. Your walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless your walking speed is slower), and you gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Piscine Transformation (Torso).name: Piscine Transformation (Torso)
Piscine Transformation (Torso).description: Your torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. You can only breathe water and can hold your breath for 1 hour. If you are not underwater when this transformation takes effect, you begin suffocating.

Reinforce Armor.name: Reinforce Armor
Reinforce Armor.description:
As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a piece of armor and fortifies it. For the next 10 minutes, a creature wearing the armor gains a bonus to their AC equal to half the blacksmith's PB.

Foundry Note

The enchantment activity on this feature currently uses the target's PB.

Reinforced Armor.name: Reinforced Armor
Reinforced Armor.description: This piece of armor grants additional AC equal to half the orc blacksmith's PB.

XbFOmnwuNWgBHC1A.name: Brutal Charge
XbFOmnwuNWgBHC1A.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target within reach.

XdiqHgdnW18YRRex.name: Adept Climber
XdiqHgdnW18YRRex.description: The wildcat has a climbing speed of 25 feet.

Adept Climber.name: Adept Climber
Adept Climber.description: You have a climbing speed of 25 feet.

Ruin Delver.name: Ruin Delver
Ruin Delver.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is behind an object that grants them &Reference[half cover], they are considered to have &Reference[three-quarters cover] instead.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, or 1 piercing damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer. (Replaces the Bite attack)

Psychic Scar.name: Psychic Scar
Psychic Scar.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

YJNHM1XkPbZygMZ7.name: Call of the Dead
YJNHM1XkPbZygMZ7.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits a creature with a signature attack, the target must also succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &reference[frightened] of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

save.condition: When the Ghost Sycophant hits a creature with their signature attack.

Flyer.name: Flyer
Flyer.description: The swarm has a flying speed of 30 feet.

Flyer.name: Flyer
Flyer.description: You have a flying speed of 30 feet.

Phantoms Abound.name: Phantoms Abound
Phantoms Abound.description: The hag fills the area around them with illusions of their enemies' worst fears. Each enemy within 30 feet of the hag must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes [[/damage average]] damage, falls &reference[prone], and if the hag is within 5 feet of the target, the hag can make a Dream Claw attack against them. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, doesn't fall prone, and the hag doesn't attack them.

Silent Pounce.name: Silent Pounce
Silent Pounce.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. Before or after teleporting, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make a signature attack. If the attack hits, the target is knocked &Reference[prone].

Lair Actions: Lich.name: Lair Actions: Lich
Lair Actions: Lich.description:
When fighting inside their lair, a lich can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the lich can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; the lich can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Soul Sip. The lich chooses two enemies they can see within 90 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a [[/save activity=23v6ptrEBV81PkL0]] saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=23v6ptrEBV81PkL0]] damage as the lair absorbs a sliver of their soul.

Spirit Shell. The lich summons spirits to surround them until the end of initiative count 20 of the next round. For the duration, a creature who hits the lich with a melee attack must succeed on a [[/save activity=9Iq1JIms8x3qorrk]] saving throw or be &Reference[dazed] until the start of the creature's next turn.

Unnatural Born Leader. The lich magnifies the power of their soulstone through the lair onto a creature they can see within 90 feet of them. The target must succeed on a [[/save activity=diPBGpHU5SBBvd2p]] saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed and make a weapon attack against a creature of the lich's choice.

affects.special: A creature who hits the lick with a melee attack.

Cackle.name: Cackle
Cackle.description: Each enemy within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] who can hear them must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EUVhk14bJVk5AFY8]] saving throw or take [[lookup @prof.flat]]d4 damage and be &Reference[frightened] of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Stone Gaze.name: Stone Gaze
Stone Gaze.description:
As an action, the headstrong fires energy beams from their eyes at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or begin to turn to stone and be &reference[restrained].

A target restrained in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature is &reference[petrified] for 1 hour or until they are restored by a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher, a greater restoration spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Shared Condition.name: Shared Condition
Shared Condition.description: When [[lookup @name]] is blinded, charmed, dazed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, or stunned, he chooses a willing Amethyst Knife boss within 60 feet of him who doesn't already have the condition or is immune to it. The chosen creature then gains the condition for the duration, and [[lookup @name]] loses the condition. He can use this reaction even while incapacitated.

Desert Warrior.name: Desert Warrior
Desert Warrior.description:
You ignore difficult terrain created by dirt or sand, and you are considered naturally adapted to hot climates.

Additionally, you can use a bonus action to activate an aura that shimmers around you like a desert mirage. For 1 minute, you and allies within 10 feet of you have a +PB bonus to Constitution saving throws and saving throws against being charmed, frightened, or knocked prone. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Desert Warrior.name: Desert Warrior
Desert Warrior.description: You and allies within 10 feet of you have a +PB bonus to Constitution saving throws and saving throws against being charmed, frightened, or knocked prone.

Coiling Claws.name: Coiling Claws
Coiling Claws.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a signature attack against a Medium or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]). Until this grapple ends, the target is &reference[restrained] and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make a signature attack against another target.

Poison Gaze.name: Poison Gaze
Poison Gaze.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses up to three creatures they can see within 15 feet of them. Each creature must succeed on a DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]] Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Anomalous Terrain.name: Anomalous Terrain
Anomalous Terrain.description: The area within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes difficult terrain for their enemies until the start of their next turn. When an enemy enters that area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=onGc5rDvqii1Fmu8]] Dexterity saving throw or take [[lookup @prof.flat]]d4 force damage.

Riverkith.name: Riverkith
Riverkith.description: You gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and you can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes. Additionally, as a bonus action, you can breathe lightning in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw against your exploit save DC, taking 6d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Sinkhole.name: Sinkhole
Sinkhole.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] burrows up to their speed and targets a creature they can sense on the surface within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sDd14vKGu8oxYkks]] Strength saving throw or be &Reference[restrained] by the ground until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Fungal Infestation.name: Fungal Infestation
Fungal Infestation.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is covered in layers of poisonous fungi. They have immunity to poison damage. The first time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage on a turn, each creature within 5 feet of them takes [[/damage]] damage.

damage.condition: The creature takes damage on a turn.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend
Shadow Blend.description: While in dim light or darkness, the underground creature can take the &Reference[Hide] action as a bonus action.

Rend and Roast.name: Rend and Roast
Rend and Roast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two signature attacks against the same target, then breathes fire on them. The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage activity=3e5nD3gBrh2qsszu]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Wraithstep.name: Wraithstep
Wraithstep.description: As an action, the freebooter becomes &reference[invisible apply=false] for 1 minute. While invisible, the freebooter has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, and the freebooter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The freebooter takes [[/damage 1d10 average force]] damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Wraithstep.name: Wraithstep
Wraithstep.description: You are invisible. While invisible, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, and you can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

Weaving Knives.name: Weaving Knives
Weaving Knives.description: As an action, the sneak moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Before, during, or after the move, they can make two signature attacks.

I'm You.name: I'm You
I'm You.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses their Shapechanger trait to polymorph into one Large or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them. Other than size, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s statistics do not change, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reverts to their previous form at the start of their next turn.

After transforming, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make a signature attack against the target whose form they have taken. Hit or miss, the target must then make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=XXFEtNCrhT44cD8L]] Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, attacks against the target have advantage and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

I'm You.name: I'm You
I'm You.description: Attacks against the target have advantage and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the mimic's next turn.

Reptilian Escape.name: Reptilian Escape
Reptilian Escape.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they can use their reaction to lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

Lose Tail.name: Lose Tail
Lose Tail.condition: The monster fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw.

Burrower.name: Burrower
Burrower.description: The swarm has a burrowing speed of 5 feet.

Burrower.name: Burrower
Burrower.description: You have a burrowing speed of 5 feet.

Death Frenzy.name: Death Frenzy
Death Frenzy.description: When an ally the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use their reaction to move up to half their speed and make a Bite attack.

utility.condition: An ally the monster can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points

Pummel.name: Pummel
Pummel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]). While grappled in this way, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s attacks (including the triggering attack) deal an extra [[lookup @prof]] damage, the target is &Reference[restrained] if they are Large or smaller, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make a signature attack against another target.

Acidic Nature.name: Acidic Nature
Acidic Nature.description: The natural acidity of the swamp gives the [[lookup @name lowercase]] resistance to acid damage. If the creature already has resistance to acid damage, they gain immunity to acid damage instead.

Soul Devourer.name: Soul Devourer
Soul Devourer.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a wish spell.

Filthy Scratch.name: Filthy Scratch
Filthy Scratch.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] scratches a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes [[/damage]] damage and is &reference[poisoned] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned.

Telekinetic Repulsion.name: Telekinetic Repulsion
Telekinetic Repulsion.description: As an action, the operative releases a powerful pulse of energy. Each enemy within 10 feet of the operative must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage]] damage and is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the operative. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

Orc.name: Orc
Orc.description:
An orc has the following defining features:

Size. The orc's size is Medium.

Type. The orc's type is Humanoid.

Speed. The orc has a walking speed of 35 feet.

Darkvision. The orc has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

Languages. The orc can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

Relentless (1/Turn). When the orc isn't incapacitated and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the orc drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

Roll Out.name: Roll Out
Roll Out.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can end this movement in a space that contains another creature. If they do, that creature takes 2 × PB bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] traveled, and they must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CqVqkBEC7siK1a95]] Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked &reference[prone]. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

Invigorated March.name: Invigorated March
Invigorated March.description:
3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power

You emit a burst of mentally invigorating energy into the mind of a creature you can see within range. That creature can use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Increased Order. When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, you target one additional creature.

Lair Actions: Overmind.name: Lair Actions: Overmind
Lair Actions: Overmind.description:
When fighting inside their lair, an overmind can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the overmind can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; the overmind can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Gas Belch. A hole opens in the ceiling, floor, or wall at a point the overmind chooses within 60 feet of them and belches a 20-foot-sphere of smelly gas that lasts until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round. When a creature enters that area for the first time or starts their turn there, they must succeed on a [[/save activity=WuqfLH7hVAjKb9rp]] saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] until the start of their next turn.

Slime Shower. Viscous slime falls from the ceiling toward one enemy within 120 feet of the overmind. The creature must succeed on a [[/save activity=fZ3yk0EqQj0Q2VT5]] saving throw or be vulnerable to fire and lightning damage. The effect ends when they take fire or lightning damage, or at the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Telekinetic Hold. An invisible force attempts to grab three enemies within 60 feet of the overmind. Each creature must make a [[/save activity=sKya8LweIKk0StjP]] saving throw. On a failed save, a creature's speed becomes 0 and they rise vertically 20 feet in the air, suspended there until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round, at which point they &Reference[falling]{fall}.

Slime Shower.name: Slime Shower
Slime Shower.description: You are vulnerable to fire and lightning damage. This effect ends when you take fire or lightning damage, or at the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Telekinetic Hold.name: Telekinetic Hold
Telekinetic Hold.description: Your speed is 0 and you are suspended 20 feet in the air until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round, at which point you fall.

Lair Actions: Vampire.name: Lair Actions: Vampire
Lair Actions: Vampire.description:
When fighting inside their lair, a vampire can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the vampire can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; the vampire can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Children of the Night. A swarm of bats and insects flies around the vampire, moving with them. The area within 30 feet of the vampire is &Reference[heavily obscured] for other creatures until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Blood Rain. The vampire chooses a point they can see within 60 feet of them. Blood rains down in a 40-foot-high, 10-foot-radius cylinder centered on this point until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round. When a creature who isn't Undead in the cylinder takes necrotic damage, they take an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

Obey My Desire. The vampire exerts their will on those who surround them. Each creature within 60 feet of the vampire who can hear them must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[charmed] by the vampire until the end of this turn. Each charmed creature must immediately use their reaction, if available, to make a melee attack against another creature, to make a melee attack against themself, or to drop &Reference[prone] (vampire's choice).

Familiar.name: Familiar
Familiar.description: The dragonet can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with their willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the dragonet senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. In addition, when the dragonet uses their Truesight action, their companion also has truesight while in physical contact with the dragonet. Either creature can end the bond at any time.

Truesight.name: Truesight
Truesight.description: When the dragonet uses their Truesight action, you also have truesight while in physical contact with the dragonet.

Lightning Bomb.name: Lightning Bomb
Lightning Bomb.description: Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Emnktqn2nomJJqaz]] Dexterity saving throw, taking [[lookup @prof.flat]]d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Clawing Frenzy.name: Clawing Frenzy
Clawing Frenzy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a signature Claw attack against [[lookup @prof.flat]] creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. At the end of their turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains 1 ferocity for every attack that missed.

Fungicea.name: Fungicea
Fungicea.description: Mushrooms sprout from your body. As part of a long rest, you can synthesize them into one dose of a healing remedy. A creature can consume the remedy as a bonus action, regaining [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 hit points. The remedy loses its potency 24 hours after creation.

Crawling Menace.name: Crawling Menace
Crawling Menace.description: You can use a bonus action to become as nimble on the ground as you are on your feet. For 1 hour, crawling doesn't cost you extra movement, creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you, being &Reference[prone apply=false] doesn't give other creatures advantage on attacks against you, and being prone doesn't give you disadvantage on attacks. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Crawling Menace.name: Crawling Menace
Crawling Menace.description: Crawling does not cost you extra movement, creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you, being prone does not give other creatures advantage on attacks against you, and being prone does not give you disadvantage on attacks.

Swimmer.name: Swimmer
Swimmer.description: The wildcat has a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Swimmer.name: Swimmer
Swimmer.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Bite Rampage.name: Bite Rampage
Bite Rampage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes signature attacks against [[lookup @prof]] creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. On a hit, a target is knocked &Reference[prone].

Wind Sweep.name: Wind Sweep
Wind Sweep.description: As a bonus action, the fledgling moves up to their flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they end this movement within 5 feet of an enemy they can see, the fledgling can make a signature attack against them.

Control Projectiles.name: Control Projectiles
Control Projectiles.description:
2nd-Order Telekinesis Power

You telekinetically affect the projectile's flight. The attack roll is made with advantage or disadvantage (your choice).

utility.condition: When  a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes  a ranged weapon attack.

Trumpeting Howl.name: Trumpeting Howl
Trumpeting Howl.description: Each enemy within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] who can hear them must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kHevFkbPSWGkBbLt]] Wisdom saving throw or be &reference[frightened] of them until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Trumpeting Howl.name: Trumpeting Howl
Trumpeting Howl.description: &reference[frightened] until the end of the monster's next turn.

Blood Puppet.name: Blood Puppet
Blood Puppet.description: As an action, the seneschal chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or move up to their speed in a direction of the seneschal's choice. During this movement, the seneschal can force them to make one attack against a creature of the seneschal's choice (no action required).

Human.name: Human
Human.description:
A human has the following defining features:

Size. The human's size is Medium.

Type. The human's type is Humanoid.

Speed. The human has a walking speed of 30 feet.

Languages. The human can speak, read, and write Common.

Exploit Opening (3/Day). When the human makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

Armor of Decay.name: Armor of Decay
Armor of Decay.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to necrotic damage, and immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

Excoriating Acid.name: Excoriating Acid
Excoriating Acid.description: As an action, the yegg throws a flask of acid at a point they can see within 20 feet of them. The flask shatters, and each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Kinetic Clamp.name: Kinetic Clamp
Kinetic Clamp.description: As a bonus action, the freebooter tries to telekinetically grip one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]] Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 force damage and is &reference[restrained] until the start of the freebooter's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not restrained.

Scavenger's Resilience.name: Scavenger's Resilience
Scavenger's Resilience.description: The bird has advantage on Constitution saving throws and resistance to poison damage.

Scavenger's Resilience.name: Scavenger's Resilience
Scavenger's Resilience.description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws and resistance to poison damage.

Shatter.name: Shatter
Shatter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ejects jagged crystals from their body toward each enemy within 10 feet of them. Each target must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RrtJ8Un42ydzmXKl]] Dexterity saving throw, taking [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Durable.name: Durable
Durable.description:
The swarm's hit points are doubled, and they have an Armor Class of 15, a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws, and advantage on Constitution saving throws. (+1 CR)

Foundry Note

This item contains an effect that will automatically apply all the properties of this feature except the doubled hit point maximum.

Durable.name: Durable
Durable.description: Your hit points are doubled, you have an AC of 15, a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws, and advantage on Constitution saving throws. (+1 CR)

Unleash Sunlight.name: Unleash Sunlight
Unleash Sunlight.description: As a bonus action, you cause your skin to flare with brilliant light. Each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you who can see you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your exploit save DC or be &Reference[blinded] for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Halting Shot.name: Halting Shot
Halting Shot.description: As an action, the warden makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

Halting Shot.name: Halting Shot
Halting Shot.description: The creatures speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

iXmIVsgWCHCTOs9B.name: Familiar
iXmIVsgWCHCTOs9B.description: The snowfox can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with their willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the snowfox senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. In addition, the snowfox can use the companion's proficiency bonus for ability checks, and the snowfox gains temporary hit points equal to the companion's proficiency bonus at the end of a long rest. Either creature can end the bond at any time.

Soul Thief.name: Soul Thief
Soul Thief.description: As an action, the deathguard shrouds themself in dark energy. The deathguard regains [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 hit points, and each enemy within 5 feet of the deathguard must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes [[/damage]] damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

Ear to the Ground.name: Ear to the Ground
Ear to the Ground.description: As a bonus action, you gain tremorsense out to a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Ear to the Ground.name: Ear to the Ground
Ear to the Ground.description: You have tremorsense out to a range of 60 feet.

Bugbear's Inspiration.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
Bugbear's Inspiration.description: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

One with the Swamp.name: One with the Swamp
One with the Swamp.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive creatures within a swamp who don't have this trait.

Stone Pereon.name: Stone Pereon
Stone Pereon.description: As a bonus action, you manifest rugged metameres on your back that last 10 minutes. For the duration, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and you can't be flanked. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Stone Pereon.name: Stone Pereon
Stone Pereon.description: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and can't be flanked

Lash Out.name: Lash Out
Lash Out.description: As a bonus action, the immobilizer whips a vine toward a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the immobilizer and &reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]). Until this grapple ends, the immobilizer's attacks against the target deal an extra [[lookup @prof]] bludgeoning damage.

Bonus Damage.name: Bonus Damage
Bonus Damage.condition: When the retainer hit's an creature it has grappled using this feature.

affects.special: Must be grappled by the retainer with this feature.

Quick Drink.name: Quick Drink
Quick Drink.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra [[lookup @prof.flat]]d4 piercing damage and is &Reference[poisoned] until the end of their next turn.

l1oXsSD2BygosERl.name: Memory Thief
l1oXsSD2BygosERl.description:
4th-Order Metamorphosis Power

You plunder the mind of a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d10 psychic damage, their proficiency bonus is lowered by 1, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and your power save DC for the duration.

Increased Order. When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by 2d10.

Stolen Memories.name: Stolen Memories
Stolen Memories.description: For the power's duration, your proficiency bonus is reduced by 1.

Gained Memories.name: Gained Memories
Gained Memories.description: For the duration of the power, you gain a +1 bonus to your attack rolls and your power save DC.

Horrific Feast.name: Horrific Feast
Horrific Feast.description: When the gnasher reduces a creature to 0 hit points with their signature attack, they can consume part of the creature as part of the attack, gaining [[/heal]]. Each enemy within 30 feet of the gnasher who can see them must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &reference[frightened] of the gnasher until the end of the gnasher's next turn.

Consume Usage and Heal.name: Consume Usage and Heal
Consume Usage and Heal.condition: When the retainer reduces a creature to 0 hit points with their signature attack.

Frightened Save.name: Frightened Save
Frightened Save.condition: When the retainer reduces a creature to 0 hit points with their signature attack.

Draconic Aberration.name: Draconic Aberration
Draconic Aberration.description:
Just like Yserthrax is a dragon with eldritch power, you can give the voiceless talkers and other aberrations in this dungeon draconic features. You can implement the following changes to any Aberration stat block in the lair to surprise characters who have faced voiceless talkers and their creations before and show that spending time around a powerful dragon like Yserthrax can magically warp nearby creatures:

Scales. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is covered in dragon scales. Their AC increases by 2.

Wings. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has leathery dragon wings. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a flying speed, their flight is powered by the wings instead of psionic might. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't have a flying speed, they gain a flying speed equal to their walking speed.

Poison Immunity. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

Draconic Senses. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is proficient in the Perception skill, and their proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check they make that uses Perception. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't have blindsight, they gain blindsight out to a range of 30 feet.

Breath Weapon. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] breathes poison in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lJC6bznlHCMBFWFV]] Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage activity=lJC6bznlHCMBFWFV]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned] for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't use this action again until they finish a long rest.

Poison-Infused Weapons. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Poison-Infused Weapons.name: Poison-Infused Weapons
Poison-Infused Weapons.description: When the Aberration hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Scales.name: Scales
Scales.description: The Aberration is covered in dragon scales. Their AC increases by 2.

Poison Immunity.name: Poison Immunity
Poison Immunity.description: The Aberration has immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

Draconic Senses.name: Draconic Senses
Draconic Senses.description: The Aberration is proficient in the Perception skill, and their proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check they make that uses Perception. If the Aberration doesn't have blindsight, they gain blindsight out to a range of 30 feet.

Wash Away.name: Wash Away
Wash Away.description: As a bonus action, the apprentice rides a crashing wave. They make a signature attack against an enemy within 5 feet of them and move up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the attack hits, it deals an extra [[lookup @prof]] bludgeoning damage.

Deafening Song.name: Deafening Song
Deafening Song.description: The swarm produces an earsplitting buzz. Each creature within 15 feet of them must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &reference[deafened] (save ends at end turn).

Take Away.name: Take Away
Take Away.description: When the neophyte hits a creature with a signature attack, the neophyte grabs the target. The target is &reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 + [[lookup @prof.flat]]), and the neophyte moves up to their speed without provoking attacks of opportunity (no action required). If the grappled creature is Medium or smaller, they don't cost the neophyte extra movement.

Presence of Inspiration.name: Presence of Inspiration
Presence of Inspiration.description: As a bonus action, the warden inspires each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them, granting them advantage on attack rolls until the start of the warden's next turn.

Presence of Inspiration.name: Presence of Inspiration
Presence of Inspiration.description: The creature has advantage on attack rolls.

Lair Actions: Qazyldrath.name: Lair Actions: Qazyldrath
Lair Actions: Qazyldrath.description:
When fighting inside their lair, Qazyldrath can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Qazyldrath can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; Qazyldrath can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Acidic Gas. Corrosive gas erupts in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Qazyldrath can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=NxrwQpcaoM9d8lMi]] saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=NxrwQpcaoM9d8lMi]] damage.

Consume Light. Qazyldrath extinguishes one or more light sources they can see within 120 feet of them. Qazyldrath regains 5 (1d10) hit points for each light source they extinguished.

Hungry Gloom. Grasping shadows sap the vitality of each enemy in dim light or darkness within 120 feet of Qazyldrath. Each target must succeed on a [[/save activity=NUMkqOF2fhmFXJwX]] saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=NUMkqOF2fhmFXJwX]] damage and be &Reference[restrained] until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Caregiver.name: Caregiver
Caregiver.description:
@Embed[Compendium.mcdm-flee-mortals-where-evil-lives.books.JournalEntry.mcdmfmwl00refe02.JournalEntryPage.00caregiver00001 inline]
Foundry note

This feature provides a "Summon" activity that will give the companion the correct number of hit points and adjust their proficiency bonus to match their caregiver.

Hellbitten Knives.name: Hellbitten Knives
Hellbitten Knives.description:
As a bonus action, the retainer imbues their daggers with hellfire. For 1 minute, their signature attack deals an extra [[lookup @prof]] fire damage and ignores damage resistances.

Foundry Note

The enchantment activity should only be used to enchant this retainer's signature attack.

affects.special: Targets the signature attack of this retainer.

Hellbitten Knives.name: Hellbitten Knives
Hellbitten Knives.description: For 1 minute, your signature attack deals an extra PB fire damage and ignores damage resistances.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed and makes a signature attack against one target, dealing an extra [[lookup @prof]] damage on a hit. If the target is Large or smaller, they are &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]), and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't attack another creature until the grapple ends.

Tackle.name: Tackle
Tackle.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]). While grappled in this way, the target is &Reference[dazed] and &Reference[restrained].

Blood Bondage.name: Blood Bondage
Blood Bondage.description: As an action, the seneschal arrests the hearts of up to [[lookup @prof.flat]] creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage]] damage and is &reference[paralyzed] for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't paralyzed.

Blip Strike.name: Blip Strike
Blip Strike.description: As a bonus action, the freebooter teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. If this space is within 5 feet of an enemy the freebooter can see, the freebooter can make a signature attack against them with advantage as part of this bonus action.

Battlefield Medicine.name: Battlefield Medicine
Battlefield Medicine.description: As an action, the mercenary restores [[lookup @prof.flat]]d8 hit points to a creature they can see within 5 feet of them.

Verdant Roundup.name: Verdant Roundup
Verdant Roundup.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets up to [[lookup @prof.flat]] creatures within 30 feet of them who are Large or smaller. Each target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and take [[/damage]] damage.

Devilish Charm.name: Devilish Charm
Devilish Charm.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use a reaction to force the creature to make a Charisma saving throw. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s proficiency bonus + the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier (whichever is highest). On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of the creature's next turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses a new target the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

Foundry Note

The save DC is set to spellcasting by default; you can either manually adjust the creature to have an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma-based spellcasting or adjust the DC calculation in the save activity.

save.condition: The monster is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other effect

Devilish Charm.name: Devilish Charm
Devilish Charm.description: The creature is &reference[charmed] by the monster until the start of the creature's next turn.

Powerful Leap.name: Powerful Leap
Powerful Leap.description: The wildcat's jump distance is doubled, with or without a running start. They can choose whether their Strength or Dexterity score determines their jump distance.

Swamp Stride.name: Swamp Stride
Swamp Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores difficult terrain caused by the natural conditions of a swamp.

Mental Lance.name: Mental Lance
Mental Lance.description:
3rd-Order Telepathy Power

You mentally assail a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d10 psychic damage and is &reference[frightened] of you for the duration (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.

Increased Order. When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by 2d10.

Death from Above!.name: Death from Above!
Death from Above!.description: As a bonus action, the yegg jumps up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they leap over an enemy during this jump, the yegg can make a signature attack with advantage against that enemy. On a hit, this attack deals an extra [[lookup @prof]] piercing damage.

Bonus Damage.name: Bonus Damage
Bonus Damage.condition: After leaping over an enemy and hitting them with the signature attack.

Lay Low.name: Lay Low
Lay Low.description: When the yegg hits a creature with a signature attack while hidden, the yegg can use their reaction to remain hidden.

utility.condition: When the retainer scores a hit on a creature while hidden.

Halberd Master.name: Halberd Master
Halberd Master.description: When a creature enters a space within the mercenary's reach, the mercenary uses a reaction to make a signature attack with advantage against that creature. If this attack hits, it deals an extra [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 slashing damage.

Extra Damage.name: Extra Damage
Extra Damage.condition: When a creature enters a space within the retainer's reach.

Sprint.name: Sprint
Sprint.description: When the bear moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

Of Unusual Size.name: Of Unusual Size
Of Unusual Size.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is Small or Tiny, their size increases to Medium and their Hit Dice type changes to a d8. This gives them 1 extra hit point per Hit Die if originally Small, or 2 extra hit points per Hit Die if originally Tiny

Foundry Note

Effects cannot provide these adjustments, they must be done manually.

Exploit Opening.name: Exploit Opening
Exploit Opening.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tZkxlrjjISRyJcxL]] Dexterity saving throw, taking [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Coagulate.name: Coagulate
Coagulate.description: As an action, the seneschal empowers the blood of up to [[lookup @prof.flat]] creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target can expend 1 Hit Die, rolling it and regaining hit points equal to twice the result plus their Constitution modifier.

Ride the Lightning.name: Ride the Lightning
Ride the Lightning.description: As an action, the apprentice supercharges their foe's nervous system. The apprentice makes a signature attack, and if it deals damage to a creature, the target must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, the target is &reference[incapacitated apply=false] and their speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

Supercharged Nervous System.name: Supercharged Nervous System
Supercharged Nervous System.description: Until the end of your next turn, you are incapacitated and your speed is halved.

Rending Teeth.name: Rending Teeth
Rending Teeth.description: As a bonus action, you can grow your teeth into natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes for 1 minute. You can use Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of your teeth, which deal 1d6 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier piercing damage instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. The first time on a turn that you hit an enemy with this attack, you and your companion regain hit points equal to the damage dealt. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

r7XXaFn9IbAr3gSa.name: Exploit Opening
r7XXaFn9IbAr3gSa.description: The mercenary takes the Attack action, making each attack with advantage and dealing an extra [[lookup @prof.flat]]d4 slashing damage on a hit.

Extra Damage.name: Extra Damage
Extra Damage.condition: Follow-up to the attacks made with this feature.

affects.special: The creature hit by the attack.

Swooping Attack.name: Swooping Attack
Swooping Attack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target. On a hit, the target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or drop one item they are holding.

Lair Actions: Sewer.name: Lair Actions: Sewer
Lair Actions: Sewer.description:
On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the sewer creature can take one of the following lair actions; the sewer creature can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Cave-In. The sewer creature rakes debris from the ceiling or knocks loose an ancient column, and the sewer tunnel partially collapses in a 15-foot cube centered on a point the sewer creature can see within 60 feet of them. Creatures in that area must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kYgdwhKhMs0kgwUG]] Dexterity saving throw or take [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 bludgeoning damage from the falling rubble. Additionally, soot and debris heavily obscure that area for the next round, and it becomes difficult terrain.

Covered in Muck. The sewer creature crushes a fungal growth near them, releasing a cloud of toxic spores. Each creature within 30 feet of the sewer creature must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=n77q4Knc7LcKhSFA]] Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Open Valves. The sewer creature cranks a valve or breaks a pipe, causing sewage to gush from a point within 60 feet of the sewer creature. Each creature in a 10-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line originating from that point must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nRvytnB4Kendt7sY]] Strength saving throw or fall &Reference[prone] in the sewage and be pushed 15 feet away from the point where the sewage originated.

Child of the Night.name: Child of the Night
Child of the Night.description: As a reaction to taking damage, the neophyte disappears in a cloud of bats and insects. Every enemy within 10 feet of the neophyte must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage]] damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. At the end of the turn, the neophyte reforms in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of where they disappeared.

Rockbreaker.name: Rockbreaker
Rockbreaker.description: Chitinous claws or blades around the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s limbs give them a burrowing speed of 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swarm makes two [[/item Bite]] attacks. (+1 CR)

Grabbed from Above.name: Grabbed from Above
Grabbed from Above.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a signature attack against a Medium or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is also &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]) if they weren't already. While grappled in this way, the target is &Reference[restrained] and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make a signature attack against another target.

Fissure Force.name: Fissure Force
Fissure Force.description: As an action, you can send tremors through dirt, sand, or solid stone. The area within 30 feet of your current space becomes difficult terrain for enemies for 1 minute. For the duration, an enemy who starts their turn inside this area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your exploit save DC or be knocked &Reference[prone]. Once you use this action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

tAp7x44j1cn6kJO2.name: Astral Presence
tAp7x44j1cn6kJO2.description: As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes &reference[invisible] for 1 minute or until they use a bonus action to end this effect. While invisible, they can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, and the their signature attacks deal an extra [[lookup @prof]] damage to creatures who can't see them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage 1d10 force average]] damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Used to Filth.name: Used to Filth
Used to Filth.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains resistance to poison damage and immunity to the poisoned condition. If the creature already has resistance to poison damage, they gain immunity to poison damage instead.

Damage Resistances.name: Damage Resistances
Damage Resistances.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks.

Damage Resistances.name: Damage Resistances
Damage Resistances.description: The devil is resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks.

Blood Seeker.name: Blood Seeker
Blood Seeker.description: As an action, the neophyte moves up to their speed toward a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. If the neophyte ends their movement within 5 feet of the creature, the target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 + [[lookup @prof.flat]]) and take [[/damage]] damage. The neophyte regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

affects.special: Must be visible for the retainer.

Living Forest.name: Living Forest
Living Forest.description: A writhing grove thrives in a 30-foot radius centered on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Mist lightly obscures that area, and colorful vines and shifting foliage make its ground difficult terrain. Teasing voices laugh and whisper, giving other creatures in that area disadvantage on saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells and similar effects. Flickering lights extinguish magical darkness in that area created by spells of 3rd level or lower. (When adding this trait to a creature, you can choose to exclude one or more of these effects.)

uk7f5l18s8AfbsLq.name: Brutal Charge
uk7f5l18s8AfbsLq.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

Griffon-Hearted.name: Griffon-Hearted
Griffon-Hearted.description: As an action, you can fly up to twice your walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During this movement, you can enter the spaces of other creatures and these spaces don't count as difficult terrain for you. The first time you enter each creature's space during this move, they must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your exploit save DC or take bludgeoning damage equal to your beastheart level and be knocked &Reference[prone]. Once you use this action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Furious Charge.name: Furious Charge
Furious Charge.description: As an action, the devastator moves up to their speed. At the end of this movement, they can make a signature attack. If that attack hits a Large or smaller creature, the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the devastator, and the devastator and their allies have advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the devastator's next turn.

Advantageous Target.name: Advantageous Target
Advantageous Target.description: Attackers have advantage on attacks against you until the end of the devastator's next turn.

Relentless.name: Relentless
Relentless.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't incapacitated and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

Frenzied Bite.name: Frenzied Bite
Frenzied Bite.description: When a creature the gnasher can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the gnasher can use a reaction to move up to half their speed and then make a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra [[@prof.flat]] piercing damage.

Move and Attack.name: Move and Attack
Move and Attack.condition: When a creature the gnasher can see within range is reduced to 0 hit points.

Extra Damage.name: Extra Damage
Extra Damage.condition: When the attack made as part of this reaction hits.

Toxiferous.name: Toxiferous
Toxiferous.description: When a creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]], that creature takes 2 (1d4) poison damage.

damage.condition: A creature hits the monster with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the monster

Bear Hug.name: Bear Hug
Bear Hug.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attempts to grab and crush a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SltnjVdSchMAZ9BK]] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes [[lookup @prof.flat]]d10 bludgeoning damage and is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is also &Reference[restrained]. The grapple ends if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Bear Hug on another target or makes a signature attack against another target.

Retaliatory Charge.name: Retaliatory Charge
Retaliatory Charge.description:
When a creature the devastator can see within 40 feet of them deals damage to the devastator, the devastator can use a reaction to move up to their speed toward the creature. If the devastator ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, they can make two signature attacks against the creature with a +[[lookup @prof]] bonus to those attack and damage rolls.

Foundry Note

The activity on this feature includes an effect that can be added to the retainer to grant the temporary bonus to attack and damage rolls.

utility.condition: When a creature within range deals damage to the retainer.

affects.special: The creature that dealt the damage.

Beacon.name: Beacon
Beacon.description: When the tactician hits with a signature attack, each creature within 5 feet of the target can use a reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the target.

Consume Usage.name: Consume Usage
Consume Usage.condition: When the tactician hits with a signature attack.

range.special: The signature attack's target is the range's origin.

Tree Stride.name: Tree Stride
Tree Stride.description: Once per turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use 10 feet of their movement to step magically into one living tree within reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be the same size category as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or bigger.

In All Your Faces!.name: In All Your Faces!
In All Your Faces!.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chaotically bounces around, smearing toxin on each enemy within 5 feet of them.

Each target must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uQp08LFdazjvTJyo]] Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 plus [[lookup @prof]] poison damage and be &Reference[blinded] until the end of the skitterling's next turn. A creature within 5 feet of a target blinded in this way can use their action to wipe the toxin off them, ending the condition for that target.

Rotwake Charge.name: Rotwake Charge
Rotwake Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, tainting the ground beneath their hooves and making it mundane difficult terrain for their enemies until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. During this move, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through the space of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. When a creature enters tainted ground for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Slime Servant.name: Slime Servant
Slime Servant.description:
If a creature spends 1 continuous minute under the effect of the slime from an olothec's Devolving Tentacle attack, that effect ends and their flesh devolves into a translucent primordial state. The creature loses their memories and sense of self, becoming a slime servant NPC who is loyal to the olothec. The slime servant retains all their original statistics and gains the following traits:

Amphibious. The slime servant can breathe air and water. They gain a swimming speed equal to their walking speed (if they didn't already have an equal or greater swimming speed).

Primordial Mind. The slime servant can't be charmed or frightened.

Servant Senses. The olothec can sense anything the slime servant senses, and if the slime servant can speak, the olothec can speak through their body.

Only a wish spell can restore a slime servant's memories and return them to their original state.

Slime Servant.name: Slime Servant
Slime Servant.description: You have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. You cannot be charmed or frightened.

Disease Carrier.name: Disease Carrier
Disease Carrier.description: When the swarm hits a creature with an attack, the target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &reference[poisoned] (save ends at end of turn).

Deadly Bite.name: Deadly Bite
Deadly Bite.description: When the wildcat hits a prone creature with a Bite attack, the attack is a critical hit.

Ankle Biter.name: Ankle Biter
Ankle Biter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a signature attack. On a hit, if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are also knocked &Reference[prone] and &Reference[grappled] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (escape DC 10 plus [[lookup @prof.flat]]).

Lair Actions: Durixaviinox.name: Lair Actions: Durixaviinox
Lair Actions: Durixaviinox.description:
When fighting inside his lair, Durixaviinox can take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), he can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

Fallen Army. Durixaviinox calls the spirits of his fallen warriors to attack up to five creatures he can see within 90 feet of him. Each target must succeed on a [[save activity=nZjUSJANTKfKO7cz]] saving throw or take [[/damage activity=nZjUSJANTKfKO7cz average]] damage from spectral arrows.

Hailstorm. Durixaviinox creates a magical hailstorm in a 30-foot cube centered on a point he can see within 120 feet of him. The storm lasts until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round. Its area is difficult terrain, and creatures who enter the storm for the first time on a turn or start their turn there must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage activity=3saL054ntFGGMzzY average]] damage.

Sovereignty. Each enemy who starts their turn within 120 feet of Durixaviinox and is aware of him must succeed on a [[/save activity=aHJmFqWvEbwBAfNE]] saving throw or be &Reference[frightened] of him until the end of initiative count 20 on the next round.

Goblin.name: Goblin
Goblin.description:
A goblin has the following defining features:

Size. The goblin's size is Small.

Type. The goblin's type is Humanoid.

Speed. The goblin has a walking speed of 30 feet and a climbing speed of 20 feet.

Darkvision. The goblin has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

Languages. The goblin can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

Crafty. The goblin doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: The bird can take a short rest while flying horizontally.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attempts to swallow a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them. The target must make a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=iTI2tMHHrlKySHKE]] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 bludgeoning damage and is swallowed. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't swallowed. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target swallowed at a time.

A swallowed target is blinded and restrained, they have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and they take [[lookup @prof.flat]]d6 acid damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] turns. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage, they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or regurgitate the swallowed creature, who falls prone in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 or half the triggering damage, whichever is higher. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is incapacitated or dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Owlie Oop.name: Owlie Oop
Owlie Oop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaps up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When they land, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zokDDGpdMr1aXOh6]] Strength saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

Mountain Dweller.name: Mountain Dweller
Mountain Dweller.description: The wildcat ignores difficult terrain created by snow, ice, or steep slopes.
